document_data.name: ''Restoration Flask''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Restoration flasks''''' were restorative [[potion]]s that could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Quaffing a ''restoration flask'' [[Lesser restoration|cured]] the imbiber of ailments and certain negative [[magical]] effects.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Tommus Tallstep]], a [[halfling]] [[fighter]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
